text:
Stride Health | San Francisco, Denver | ONSITE | FULL-TIME

At Stride, we help people who work for themselves save time and money on things like insurance and taxes by providing simple, easy to use software, tools and services.

We're currently looking for backend, frontend, and fullstack engineers. The specific job descriptions can be found here: https://jobs.lever.co/stridehealth

We use: React/Redux, Node, Redis, Postgres for our web app; Swift and Kotlin for our mobile apps (Stride Tax); Scala and Python for backend services; and variety of AWS services for DevOps/infrastructure

Here's more about what it's like to work at Stride: https://stridehealth.com/careers.

I've been an engineer here for almost 2 years and it's been really rewarding. Feel free to email me with any questions at emerson.hum [at] stridehealth.com
